title: De la taille périnéale chez l'homme
creator: Dourry, Mohammed
publisher: Paris : A. Parent, Imprimeur de la Faculté de Médecine, 1869.
description: Medical dissertation of Mohammed Dourry (Dourri) who studied at the medical faculty at University of Paris in 1869. Dourry was part of the Egyptian Mission to France and possibly the first Egyptian national to receive a Western medical degree.
subject: Perineum--Surgery; Surgical Instruments; Urologic Surgical Procedures--methods
extent: xxiv, [25]-98 pages, 4 plates, [2] pages : illustrations (some color)
rights: This item is in the public domain.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
